english.segment1: Verse 1: How beautiful are You Lord. A spring of life to me. Words of love caress my soul. You fill my every need
english.segment2: Verse 2: And precious are Your statutes. They guide my every move. I'm so in love with You Lord. Your love shines over me
english.segment3: Chorus: And I will seek You with all my heart. I will lift my voice to You. No matter how I feel my hope's in You. For You have rescued me from calamity. Set my feet on solid ground. Oh Lord You are a spring of life to me
english.segment4: Verse 3: Your Word secure within me. Has kept my feet from strife. Forever I will thank You. For giving me new life
english.segment5: . Bridge: And I will love You Jesus. My life's within Your hands. Teach me guide me. Into Your master plan
english.segment6: Coda: You are a spring of life to me. You are a spring of life to me
